doctor.name: Dr. Sarwar Kamal
doctor.specialty: Cardiovascular, Chest Diseases & Heart Specialist Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Sarwar Kamal is a Cardiac Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS (RMC), MS (CV&T), NICVD. He is the Chief Cardiac Surgeon, Cardiac Surgery at Chittagong Metropolitan Hospital Heart Center. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Chattogram Metropolitan Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Sarwar Kamal at Chattogram Metropolitan Hospital is 11am to 2pm (Closed: Friday).
